name.description: Specifies the name of the ServiceBus Namespace resource . Changing this forces a

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

sku.description: Defines which tier to use. Options are basic, standard or premium.

capacity.description: Specifies the capacity. When `sku` is `Premium`, capacity can be `1`, `2`, `4` or `8`. When `sku` is `Basic` or `Standard`, capacity can be `0` only.

zone_redundant.description: Whether or not this resource is zone redundant. `sku` needs to be `Premium`. Defaults to `false`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

default_primary_connection_string.description: The primary connection string for the authorization

default_secondary_connection_string.description: The secondary connection string for the

default_primary_key.description: The primary access key for the authorization rule `RootManageSharedAccessKey`.

default_secondary_key.description: The secondary access key for the authorization rule `RootManageSharedAccessKey`.

create.description: Used when creating the ServiceBus Namespace.

update.description: Used when updating the ServiceBus Namespace.

read.description: Used when retrieving the ServiceBus Namespace.

delete.description: Used when deleting the ServiceBus Namespace.
